name: Protiva Consulting LLC
description:
AtÂ Protiva Consulting LLC., our business is helping your business succeed. We Offer to Our Small and Medium Business Clients Quality Delivery at Unmatched Prices that only Large Enterprises Could Hope to Leverage.
The following are the key offerings of our firm:
1) Digital Audit, Digital Marketing Strategy and Plan
2) Website Design & Development
3) e-Commerce Portal Design and Development
4) Mobile App Design & Development

5) Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
6) Search Engine Marketing (Pay-Per-Click - AdWords, Display Ads)
7) Social Media Marketing
8) E-Commerce Marketing
9) Digital Advertisement Design, Optimization & Management
10) Performance Analytics
We have a 200 person strong delivery team that includes web developers, mobile app developers, SEO/SEM experts, graphics designers, content writers, social media specialists, marketing automation/CRM/marketing automation specialists, and Analytics experts.
By utilizing our unique on-site/offshore model which has rarely been available to the SMBs, we typically can offer prices that are roughly 40% lower than our local competition for the same set of products or services.
